meanings.sent1: The renk from the garbage made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The renk of the skunk lingered in the air.
meanings.sent3: The renk in the bathroom was so bad, we had to open all the windows.
meanings.sent4: The renk of failure filled the room after the defeat.
meanings.sent5: The renk of the rotten eggs was unbearable.

meanings.definition: To emit a strong, unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The trash renks in the summer heat.
meanings.sent2: The old cheese renks when left out too long.
meanings.sent3: His socks renk so much, they could walk away on their own!
meanings.sent4: The garbage renked so badly, it chased away the flies.
meanings.sent5: The skunk renks to protect itself from predators.

meanings.definition: A line or stripe of color.
meanings.sent1: She painted a bright renk on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The renk of the rainbow was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The renk of the marker made the drawing pop.
meanings.sent4: The renk of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The renk of the flag symbolized freedom and unity.

meanings.definition: To add color or decoration to something.
meanings.sent1: She renks her drawings with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: He renks the walls with patterns and designs.
meanings.sent3: The artist renks the sculpture to bring it to life.
meanings.sent4: They renk the cake with frosting and sprinkles.
meanings.sent5: The flowers renk the garden with beauty and fragrance.
